metaData.title: Services
metaData.description: Doula services including birth support, lactation services, and postpartum care.

headline: Services to support your unique journey.
intro: Every family's needs are different. I offer flexible packages designed to meet you where you are—whether you need comprehensive birth support, postpartum care, or guidance preparing for your new arrival.

services.name: Birth Doula Support
services.description: Continuous emotional, physical, and informational support during labor and delivery. Includes prenatal visits to discuss your birth preferences, on-call availability, and immediate postpartum support.

services.name: Lactation Support
services.description: As a Certified Lactation Counselor (CLC), I provide feeding support to help families navigate breastfeeding and newborn feeding with confidence. I offer practical guidance, hands-on strategies, and compassionate encouragement tailored to your goals.

services.name: Postpartum Doula Care
services.description: Nurturing support during the fourth trimester as you adjust to life with your new baby. Whether you need daytime help or overnight support, I provide care for the whole family.

services.name: Mix & Match Services
services.description: Not seeing a package that fits? You can build your own plan by selecting only the services you want — from prenatal visits to lactation support and postpartum care.
